intro: ^You're back! I'm grateful that you could return to us, at least. What did you find?

c-0: ^Papers and maps, mostly. Plans for something even those bastards didn't seem to understand.
^There was no one left. I'm sorry.

mourning: ^...I see. Well, I cannot thank you enough for trying. It's more than I could do. Now if you'd be so kind, I need some time to myself.
